name: GameForm: Play Games for Money
description:
Over $25,000 in cash prizes awarded!

Compete in mobile gaming tournaments and iMessage contests for real cash prizes! A wildly popular and exciting new take on mobile gaming!

GameForm is the destination to play fun mobile games for cash prizes! New skill-based tournaments are added hourly and daily. Simply buy a “shot bundle” and use your shots to compete in real-money tournaments to improve your ranking and win a big cash prize.

How tournaments work:
-Select a game from the lobby
-Buy a “Shot Bundle”
-Compete for the high score in the tournament
-Win cash prizes based on your tournament rank

How iMessage contests work:
-Challenge your friends to real money games via iMessage

No ads or confusing e-currencies. GameForm is flipping the script on the mobile gaming experience and making it easy to play skill-based games for real cash. Our platform is extremely user-friendly and great for casual gamers all the way up to professional gamers.

Cash out anytime using Paypal.

GameForm only uses the most trusted and secure payment gateways for transactions (Apple Pay, PayPal & Stripe).

Key Features:
-Real cash prizes
-Simple and easy to learn games
-Referral bonuses up to $25
-Bonuses for daily power users
-No annoying ads
-Awesome Games

GameForm is only available in the United States. GameForm tournaments and cash contests are currently available in 42 US states. Tournaments and cash contests are NOT available in Arizona, Arkansas, Delaware, Louisiana, Montana, South Carolina, South Dakota, and Tennessee. You must be 18 years or older to play.
